column1: Little Goat Diner////Love. Attended an event upstairs.  All of the appetizers were amazing
column4: oysters. Then the dinner was even better. Cashew green beans
column6: sea bass and lamb ribs. If I had room I would have had seconds. The tiny strawberry shortcake was ok. Nice size but a more simple marinated strawberry without the unnecessary  carbs would have been better. Service was impeccable.
